summary: The Observatory was once an abandoned tower that has been taken over by an enigmatic mage. With a bit of telvanni magic and some forbidden secrets it's become a unique abode that explains a bit of the owner's story.
descriptionHtml:
Mod and art created by Serpentwined, for more stories and art related to characters involved with this mod you can [url=http://adelein-gardinier.tumblr.com/]visit this blog
[b]
[/b][/url][b]This does require Dragonborn![/b]

 There isn't a lot of intractable content here for dragonborn collectors to display their items, this mod focuses more on the story of my own personal characters with a lot of new lore ideas and stories to read. It's catered to the owner's tastes and not the dragonborn's, making it more of a point of interest mod rather than a house mod (You CAN use it as a house if you want, however). I've been using this to make screenshots for my own personal stories based on Elder Scrolls characters and decided to make this public for other's to explore. 

The tower is in Falkreath just north of Knifepoint Ridge.

I lost the sheet that has all the credit to custom content and currently rebuilding it to post it here soon, if you are a creator of any tools and assets used in this mod let me know so I can properly accredit you. I posted it here first just in case anyone is quicker to find the information then I am.


Modders resources used: 
Caliente 
stroti 
Blary 
Elianora 
Lolicept 
Tamira 

If I missed any let me know!
author: Serpentwined
